remarks: Change bound variable in a product.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Dec-2017.)
statement:
cbvprod.1 $e |- ( j = k -> B = C ) $.
cbvprod.2 $e |- F/_ k A $.
cbvprod.3 $e |- F/_ j A $.
cbvprod.4 $e |- F/_ k B $.
cbvprod.5 $e |- F/_ j C $.
cbvprod $p |- prod_ j e. A B = prod_ k e. A C $.
$d j k $.
